title: Been Appreciating the Rioter Bazerka on these Boards
body:
I've noticed a Rioter has the courage to comment on posts outside of Story, Art,& Sound/Report a Bug. It's really encouraging to see one involved in feedback on the player base's opinion of the game's state. 
Even an occasional acknowledgement from a rioter on the boards that the majority of players' opinion on the game state (which has been very unified on a few issues that feel ignored right now) is at least being heard is welcome. Sadly this type of interaction has been an extremely rare occurrence lately :/ It's a step towards a feeling that the state of the game isn't a one way conversation, so thanks Bazerka!
